---
title: Overhead Squat (OH Squat)
---


# Evaluation

Used in [SFMA]({{< var ref-selective-functional-movement-assessment.path >}})

## Technique


::: {.panel-tabset}

## SFMA

- Feet pointed forward
- Feet shulder width apart
- Hold dowel overhead

## Other


:::



# Setup

- Feet shoulder width apart 
- Toes straight or slightly toed out
- Bar raised overhead in snatch grip



# Action {#action}

- Squat as if you're sitting down
- Then Return to start position




# Key points

- Tall chest
- Hells down
- Hip crease below knee crease
- Neutral spine
- Strong OH position




# Faults 

- Shoulders drop forward
- Heels come up
- Not going to parallel
- Loses neutral spine
- Lose OH position

# Treatment Principles

- Motor control vs mobility issue
- Positional isometrics = Right cueing for putting the pt in the correct positions and training motor control there
